about_the_game:
Bring your tale to life! From Bitter Sweet Entertainment comes their second music pack which includes BGMs for use in your light-novel game.

Provided in both m4a and ogg formats, this pack includes:
42 BGM tracks

Includes (ogg / m4a):
1. LNSM2_BGM01_Theme1
2. LNSM2_BGM02_Theme2
3. LNSM2_BGM03_Theme3
4. LNSM2_BGM04_Theme4
5. LNSM2_BGM05_Theme5

14. LNSM2_BGM14_Musicbox1
15. LNSM2_BGM15_Musicbox2
16. LNSM2_BGM16_Nostalgia1
17. LNSM2_BGM17_Nostalgia2
18. LNSM2_BGM18_Nostalgia3
19. LNSM2_BGM19_Comical1
